question: How many numbers are between 100 to 200?
explanation: This question is very easy, here we can get the numbers between 100 to 200 just by this simple calculation, (200-100) + 1 = 101. Here we have added 1 from outside because if in series 100 would  be not added then we will do (200 - 100), but here in quesion 100 is added in our series so we have add 1.
